question: What is the capital of Cyprus?
explanation: Nicosia is the capital of Cyprus. This city is divided by the "Green Line", which is known as the United Nations Buffer Zone. It is the only capital in the world that is divided between two nations- one is internationally recognised the Republic of Cyprus and the other is self-declared unofficial de-facto Turkish Republic of North Cyprus. Sofia is the capital of Bulgaria. Bucharest is the capital of Romania. Tirana is the capital of Albania.
